headline: Assessing Fortinet’s Value After Recent Stock Gains and Cybersecurity Sector Momentum in 2025
summary: Trying to decide what to do with Fortinet shares right now? You are definitely not alone. Whether you are a long-term believer or have just started looking at security stocks, Fortinet’s recent moves have caught plenty of investor attention. Just look at the numbers. After weathering some ups and downs this year, the stock has slid about 11.9% year-to-date, but it is up 2.9% compared to a year ago and a massive 220% over the last five years. Over the past month, Fortinet has inched up 3.9%,...
